fulltext:
About me
I have 13 years of working experience in Marketing, Brand and
Communications management. My career goals are learning more Marketing
knowledge, improving my working skills every day. I want to become a good,
high effective manager in any business �eld that I will work in the future.
Contact
 Email: 
 Tel: 

ĐC: Binh Tan District, HCM city
Phạm Ngọc Quỳnh
Như
MARKETING COMMUNICATION
MANAGER
SKILLS
WORK EXPERIENCES
BRAND COMMUNICATION MANAGER
7/2017-present
Khai Toan joint stock company (KTG)
KTG's own brands: Comet (Home Appliances), Comet LED (LED lighting 
equipments), AC (Electrical equipments for Construction projects), KTG 
Industrial (Industrial real estate); Exclusive distribution brands: Mitsubishi 
Electric, Osram… 
- 
Create and execute Brand development strategy for KTG’s own brands: 
Comet, Comet LED, AC. Manage the staffs in Brand Department and 
Agencies to perform the short-term, long-term Brand, Communication plans. 
- 
Coordinate Trade Marketing to manage online PR campaigns for Comet, 
Comet LED, with promotions and business on e-commerce and channels for 
pushing sale. 
- 
Develop andexecute marketing plans for the industrial real estate 
segment: KTG Industrial. 
- 
Build and develop the websites, platforms, App..., own communication 
channels: YouTube, Fanpage, Linked In... for the brands. 
- 
Develop and execute Marketing plans for Bussiness real estate: KTG 
Industrial. 
- 
Monitor and execute CSR activities, crisis management ... for KTG and 
brands. 
- 
Online PR: Google ads, GDN, DSP, Remarketing, Facebook ads, Chat Box, 
KOLs, In�uencers, You Tube, Email & SMS Marketing, online PR articles, 
Analytics…. 
- 
Analyze and ensure the effectiveness of all branding, communication 
and marketing efforts. 
Achievements: 
- 
Built the "Bếp Thông Thái" YouTube Channel successfully for Comet 
Home Appliances. This channel had been invited to cooperate from many 
major partners: MeTub, Điền Quân... 
- 
Innovated key message and the branding system for AC. Therefore 
found out many business customers from the media campaigns of this 
brand. 
©VietCV.io-1 of 3
Communicate, create elationships with
Media, Agency and the partners.
Communication & Branding strategy
B2B, B2C Marketing Management
Content
Digital Marketing
Trade Marketing
Budget management
Crisis management
Build and develop Marketing Team
MARKETING COMMUNICATION MANAGER
8/2015 -7/2017
Long Beach Corporation
(Long Beach Pearl – a high-class pearl jewelry brand, Long Beach seafood 
restaurant/Karaoke & Sim Spa)
-      Analyze brand positioning and consumer insights. Lead creative 
development to motivate the target audience to “take action”. 
-  
Manage a team of marketing people working on brand initiatives. 
Oversee marketing and advertising activities. Liaise with other department, 
manage execution details of all Marketing activities. 
-  
Measure and report performance of all marketing campaigns, and 
assess ROI and KPIs. 
-  
Lead Partnerships and Co-branding campaigns. 
-  
Lead team to manage Local as well as Store Marketing initiatives, 
including promotions, in-stores and below-the-line activations. 
-  
Analyze and Optimize sales performance of stores, day part, and 
product lines. 
-  
Manage Marketing Calendar and Communication Budget. 
-  
Support Director with strategic planning and other business initiatives. 
-  
Build up and develop marketing plan, analyze marketing and sales 
perfomance of product line to ensure business growth. 
-  
Master plan for whole year and manage all marketing activites of ATL, 
BTL to build brand equity and meet business objectives. 
-  
Follow promotional plans for attractive activities to push the sale 
strongly. 
- 
 Plan annual budget to design & execute 360 degree marketing 
campaigns around target audiences. 
- 
Manage all of Digital marketing activities: Google: Adwords, GDN, 
Remarketing, Youtube, SEO.. ; Facebook: Fanpage management, Facebook 
Ads, Instagram, Messenger..; Wi�, Email & SMS Marketing. 
Achievements: 
- 
Positioned and built up successfully new brand Long Beach Pearl to 
become being one of the famous high-class pearl jewelry brand. This brand 
has been honored to be selected as the crown maker for the famous beauty 
contests: Miss Universe Vietnam, Miss Vietnam, Miss World Vietnam. Long 
Beach Pearl jewelry is also used in the fashion shows of many famous 
designers: Adrian Anh Tuan, Do Manh Cuong, Le Thanh Hoa… 
- 
Push Sale: Coordinated Sales & Customer Care Department to organize 
promotions. Sales from those programs increased from 100% to 200%. 
Opened many new effective sales channels: Online, Private Sale…
EDUCATION
BACHELOR OF VIETNAMESE
LITERATURE 
-
University of Social Sciences and
Humanities (Hochiminh city)
(Graduation thesis' score: 10/10) 
CERTIFICATES
SPEAK UP
(2019-2020)
English (Intermediate)
CASK ACADEMY
(9/2019)
Brand & Marketing Strategy
EVQN (2008)
Digital Marketing 
©VietCV.io-2 of 3
 MARKETING COMMUNICATION MANAGER
2012-2015
Bach Khoa Investment & Development of Solar Energy corporation
(Solar BK)
(Solar water heater: retail and project, renewable energy solutions: solar cell 
panel, wind power...)
-  
Plan marketing and branding objectives. Manage all of Communication 
& Marketing budgets. 
-  
Prepare marketing strategies alongside other company executives and 
staff. 
-  
Analyze market trends and recommend changes to marketing and 
business development strategies based on analysis and feedback.  
-  
Oversee creation and delivery of press releases, advertisements, and 
other marketing materials. Lead all areas of content generation and 
production across all media platforms. Being responsible for Press releases, 
website’s content editor, script writer for print ads, PR articles, PR reports, 
building scripts for TVC, television news, events…   
-  
Deepen relationships with all media to ensure the most effective 
messaging and positioning of the organization.  
-  
Ensure brand messages are consistent. Engage consumers on social 
media. - Drive overall CRM and direct marketing.  
-  
Collaborate with sales and sourcing to develop strategic partnership 
activities and implement the execution framework and strategic plan on 
identi�ed opportunities.  
-  
Develop and lead a marketing team that will develop and execute new 
concepts, business models, channels and partners to position business as 
innovator and leader.   
Achievements:
- 
Organized successfully the press conference, which coordinated the 
Ministry of International Trade and Industry. This event introduced ESCO, one 
of the best energy-saving technology solution. There were 3-4 contracts 
using the ESCO project that had been signed with big hotels (example for Đệ 
Nhất Sài Gòn Restaurant...) in this event. 
- 
Achieved well brand awareness of Solar BK with the low budget, through 
CSR events with 350 organization, Saigon Giai Phong Newspaper...
PR SUPERVISOR 
2006-2012
Southern Airports Services Company (SASCO)
(Restaurants, souvenir shops, duty-free shops, Business-class lounges, travel 
services, resorts, real estate...). 
-  
Develop and achieve internal and external PR plans. Coordinate to 
organize big events, CSR inside and outside the company. 
-  
Support and representatives of Head of Department communicate with 
partners, journalists... 
Achievements:
- 
Cooperated in exchanging advertisements and placing newspapers in 
the Business- class lounges of Tan Son Nhat Airport, saving billions VND of 
ads per year for SASCO with the famous newspapers such as Doanh Nhân 
Sai Gon, Doanh Nhan Sai Gon cuoi tuan…
